price: Gyesε wͻn ayerenom (nko ara) hͻ, anaasε wͻn (mfenaa) a wͻyε wͻn dea no hͻ.. Nokorε sε woi nom na soboͻ biara nna wͻn soͻ.
arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُومِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: illā ʿalā azwājihim aw mā malakat aymānuhum fa-innahum ghayru malūmīna
